section.name: JWeather - Java Weather Library
section.p: jweather is a Java library for parsing raw weather data (e.g. METAR, TAF). Initially it will focus on parsing and providing an API for access to METAR data, but may grow to include access to multiple reporting formats.

section.name: Project Code and Funding
section.p: All source is available under the GPL license. The project may be moved to the LGPL license in the near future.
